## css-es-modules package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [collectStyles()](./css-es-modules.collectstyles.md) | Start collecting of styles. |
|  [injectStyles(stylesheetKey, stylesheetBody, options, serverSide, shadowRoot)](./css-es-modules.injectstyles.md) | Inject stylesheet to global on node or to the document DOM on the browser |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [StylesCollector](./css-es-modules.stylescollector.md) | The collector object. |
|  [StylesInjectOptions](./css-es-modules.stylesinjectoptions.md) | Inject options. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [CSS\_GLOBAL\_KEY](./css-es-modules.css_global_key.md) | Global styles shared context property name. |
|  [CSS\_LOCALS\_KEY](./css-es-modules.css_locals_key.md) | Local styles shared context property name. |
|  [defaultStylesInjectOptions](./css-es-modules.defaultstylesinjectoptions.md) | Default options values. |
